txt.en: Palma Brownlock is on the slope outside the ruins of Naerost.\n\nPalma is eagerly awaiting your return with Medhrod.

'Are you ready, [placeholder]? If you're a burglar worth your salt, you won't have any difficulty sneaking into Naerost over there and coming back here with Medhrod. You are worth your salt, aren't you, [placeholder]? Go on, make me proud!\n\n'I'd do it myself, but I figure you could use the practice. You're welcome!'

'You did it! Well, that's a relief, isn't it, [placeholder]? I'm sure you didn't have any trouble!

'Now let's go back to the Inn and spread the good news -- the half-orcs aren't in possession of Medhrod any longer, and it serves them right!

'Let me know when you're ready to go.'
'Medhrod is probably being kept somewhere deep inside the ruins, [placeholder]. Try not to be seen, or you'll have a difficult fight on your hands!'
'I'm ready to leave if you are! The Inn awaits!'
Palma Brownlock has convinced you to reacquire the sword Medhrod, stolen by half-orcs at Naerost in the Lone-lands.
'Good luck, [placeholder]! Don't get seen, if you can help it!'
Palma Brownlock is waiting to speak with you on the hills outside Naerost.\n\nPalma has somehow convinced you to sneak into the ruins of Naerost to reacquire the sword Medhrod.
The sword Medhrod is somewhere within the ruins of Naerost.\n\nThe half-orcs that stole Medhrod are surely keeping the sword under close watch inside the ruins.
